group_1.narration: I somehow convinced Kyoko to help,@although she couldn't stop the constant@tasting. Then finally...

group_1.textRight: Phew...
Now that it's done...
[chara:200601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's smellin' real good!

group_1.textLeft: You haven't taken your eyes off the gateau @once, Kyoko...

group_1.textRight: Well, the final taste test is the most@important, yeah?
This is the best bit, isn't it?
All the samples I took before were practice.

group_1.textLeft: Do you need practice to taste test...?

group_1.textRight: Anyway, let me handle the tasting!

group_1.textLeft: Honestly... [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:eyeClose_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]Here you go, the extra piece.

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heh heh! Don't mind if I do!
Homph!
[chara:200601:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Ah!
This...is...

group_1.textLeft: What?! Did it turn out bad...?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]AMAZIN'!
The outside is crisp...the center's moist...@Not too sweet, just a teensy bit bitter...
Man, it's sooo good!
But, ya know...
It's hard to tell from just one. I gotta @have another...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you...hands off! There won't be any@left for anyone else!

group_1.textRight: Aww!
So this one's for Madoka? And this is for@Homura?
Then one for me, and one for Mami...
Oh?
There's still one left over?
You're gonna eat that one?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's it! I wanna try it too!

group_1.textRight: Then I think I'll just take a littleâ€”

[chara:200601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Uwagh! [chara:200601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200601:cheek_0][chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1]Don't yell at me all of a sudden!
You're awfully eager to protect that cake...
Hmmm? Your face is all red...
Really? You're always kinda loud though.

group_1.narration: Anyway, with that, everything was ready.
Only one thing left to do...
